name: HTTP Request
semantic_context: Makes an HTTP request and returns the response data
natural_language_description: 这是 HTTP Request 节点。主要用于: Makes an HTTP request and returns the response data

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 作用: The way to authenticate | 默认值: none

requestMethod.name: requestMethod
requestMethod.natural_language_description: 参数名: Request Method | 作用: The request method to use | 默认值: GET

url.name: url
url.description: The URL to make the request to
url.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL | 作用: The URL to make the request to | (必填项)

allowUnauthorizedCerts.name: allowUnauthorizedCerts
allowUnauthorizedCerts.description: Whether to download the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
allowUnauthorizedCerts.natural_language_description: 参数名: Ignore SSL Issues (Insecure) | 作用: Whether to download the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible | 默认值: False

responseFormat.name: responseFormat
responseFormat.description: The format in which the data gets returned from the URL
responseFormat.natural_language_description: 参数名: Response Format | 作用: The format in which the data gets returned from the URL | 默认值: json

dataPropertyName.name: dataPropertyName
dataPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output File in Field | 提示: The name of the output binary field to put the file in | 默认值: data | (必填项)

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.description: Whether the query and/or body parameter should be set via the value-key pair UI or JSON/RAW
jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON/RAW Parameters | 作用: Whether the query and/or body parameter should be set via the value-key pair UI or JSON/RAW | 默认值: False

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: batchInterval (值: None) - Time (in milliseconds) between each batch of requests. 0 for disabled.
batchSize (值: None) - Input will be split in batches to throttle requests. -1 for disabled. 0 will be treated as 1.
bodyContentType (值: None) - Content-Type to use to send body parameters
fullResponse (值: None) - Whether to return the full response data instead of only the body
followAllRedirects (值: None) - Whether to follow All HTTP 3xx redirects
followRedirect (值: None) - Whether to follow GET or HEAD HTTP 3xx redirects
ignoreResponseCode (值: None) - Whether to succeeds also when status code is not 2xx
bodyContentCustomMimeType (值: None) - Specify the mime type for raw/custom body type
proxy (值: None) - HTTP proxy to use
splitIntoItems (值: None) - Whether to output each element of an array as own item
timeout (值: None) - Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request
useQueryString (值: None) - Whether you need arrays to be serialized as foo=bar&foo=baz instead of the default foo[0]=bar&foo[1]=baz

sendBinaryData.name: sendBinaryData
sendBinaryData.description: Whether binary data should be send as body
sendBinaryData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Send Binary File | 作用: Whether binary data should be send as body | 默认值: False

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.description: For Form-Data Multipart, they can be provided in the format: `"sendKey1:binaryProperty1,sendKey2:binaryProperty2`
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 作用: For Form-Data Multipart, they can be provided in the format: `"sendKey1:binaryProperty1,sendKey2:binaryProperty2` | 提示: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded | 默认值: data | (必填项)

bodyParametersJson.name: bodyParametersJson
bodyParametersJson.description: Body parameters as JSON or RAW
bodyParametersJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Body Parameters | 作用: Body parameters as JSON or RAW

bodyParametersUi.name: bodyParametersUi
bodyParametersUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Body Parameters | 作用: The body parameter to send | 默认值: {}

headerParametersJson.name: headerParametersJson
headerParametersJson.description: Header parameters as JSON or RAW
headerParametersJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Headers | 作用: Header parameters as JSON or RAW

headerParametersUi.name: headerParametersUi
headerParametersUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Headers | 作用: The headers to send | 默认值: {}

queryParametersJson.name: queryParametersJson
queryParametersJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Query Parameters | 作用: Query parameters as JSON (flat object)

queryParametersUi.name: queryParametersUi
queryParametersUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Query Parameters | 作用: The query parameter to send | 默认值: {}

infoMessage.displayName: You can view the raw requests this node makes in your browser's developer console
infoMessage.name: infoMessage
infoMessage.natural_language_description: 参数名: You can view the raw requests this node makes in your browser's developer console
